name: ResidualMarketFacilityTier
title: Residual Market Facility Tier
description: Residual Market Facility Tier codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: A tier classification for applicants who are assessed higher charges due to elevated risk factors or claims history.
A standard tier classification for applicants who meet typical eligibility criteria without additional risk factors.
A tier classification for applicants who qualify for reduced charges due to favorable risk characteristics or claims-free history.
